channel.title: Morning FID Briefing

item.title: The ECB Podcast — How the ECB steers inflation
item.description: Latest ECB Podcast episode on monetary policy and inflation outlook.

item.title: Bondcast — BoE and ECB outlook for rates

item.title: Reuters — Decoupling: Fed vs. ECB policies
item.description: Reuters macro team analyses diverging paths between the Fed and ECB.

item.content:encoded: Reuters macro team analyses diverging paths between the Fed and ECB.

item.title: Macro Minutes — Fed and US rates outlook
item.description: RBC’s Macro Minutes discusses the Fed’s next move and impact on Treasuries.
